name: Into the Woods (narou)
description:
Into The Woods

Made for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3.

The theme was "Less is more" which was applied both to the art style and the gameplay. 

The point of the game is to collect hearts before yours run out but you need to be careful not to collect more than you need, otherwise the guards will attack you.  The less hearts you collect the easier the game is.

This was my first time participating in a game jam and also the first time making a platformer and i have to say, it was REALLY fun.

Game made using Unity.

Assets made using Procreate.

Music made using Garage Band.
